channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- FreeRDP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- FreeRDP

item.title: CVE-2018-8789|2024-08-05T07:02:26.047Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains several Out-Of-Bounds Reads in the NTLM Authentication module that results in a Denial of Service (segfault).

item.title: CVE-2018-8787|2024-08-05T07:02:26.068Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains an Integer Overflow that leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function gdi_Bitmap_Decompress() and results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8784|2024-08-05T07:02:26.069Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function zgfx_decompress_segment() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8785|2024-08-05T07:02:26.117Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function zgfx_decompress() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8788|2024-08-05T07:02:26.104Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains an Out-Of-Bounds Write of up to 4 bytes in function nsc_rle_decode() that results in a memory corruption and possibly even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8786|2024-08-05T07:02:26.040Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains an Integer Truncation that leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function update_read_bitmap_update() and results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.
